short_summary: Site upgrades and sewage system improvements at the Kwisitis Visitor Centre.
description: The major components of this contract include but are nothing more than the supply and installation of a new fibreglass reinforced plastic sewage storage tank, new sewage piping to connect to the existing pump station, minor pump station improvements, drainage Improvements and site restoration. Construction takes place at the site of a heritage designated visitor center which may be opened to the public during construction. Two-stage selection process invitation only.
duration_in_months: No information  provided about the duration of this project. The current notice only gives information prior to a stage 2 tendering  process  delivering  an  invidual bidder named Harmon Rhet
full_summary:
### Stage 2 of Kwisitis VC Waste Water Upgrades - Pacific Rim National Park Reserve
#### Contract Title
**English Title:**
Kwisitis VC Waste Water Upgrades - Pacific Rim National Park Reserve

**French Title:**
Modernisation du système d’eaux usées du centre d’accueil Kwisitis - Réserve de parc national Pacific Rim

#### Project Reference Information

[Contract URL](link provided upon registration)
**CRA ID:** cb-6205-73444011
**Modification:** None
**Tender ID:** 5P468-23-0041/A
**Publication Date:** June 6, 2023

#### Tender Details

*   **Tender Closing Date**: June 20, 2023, @ 16:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: To be determined
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: To be determined
*   **Classification**: 
    *   UN UNSPSC Categories:
        *   Drainage services (70171800)
        *   Pumping station construction service (72141125)
        *   Underground utilities construction service (72141126)
    *   Procurement Category: Capital Construction
    *   Baseline Adjusted Procurement Category: Capital Construction

#### Tender Requirements
The project scope involves site improvements at the Kwisitis Visitor Centre, Pacific Rim National Park Reserve, including:

*   Upgrade of waste water system
*   Earthwork remediation
*   Supply and installation of new sewage storage tank
*   New sewage piping connections
*   Minor pump station improvements
*   Site restoration

Due to the heritage designation of theses sites, sites may be opened during construction.

### Procurement Method
This tender is part of a 2-stage solicitation process:

1.  Stage 1: Evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers
2.  Stage 2: Invite qualified suppliers to provide financial bids

### Evaluation Criteria
The contract will be awarded to the lowest-priced bidder who meets the project requirements.
